Character.rules: Character. If you're seeing this, something has gone wrong.

Townsfolk.rules: Townsfolk. If you're seeing this, something has gone wrong.

Outsider.rules: Outsider. If you're seeing this, something has gone wrong.

Minion.rules: Minion. If you're seeing this, something has gone wrong.

Demon.rules: Demon. If you're seeing this, something has gone wrong.

Traveler.rules: Traveler. If you're seeing this, something has gone wrong.

Storyteller.rules: Storyteller. If you're seeing this, something has (probably) gone wrong.

Witch.rules: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

No Dashii.rules: Each night\*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbours are poisoned.

Monk.rules: Each night\*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

Empath.rules: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbours are evil.

Cerenovus.rules: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are "mad" they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.

Chambermaid.rules: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many wake tonight due to their character ability.

Clockmaker.rules: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.

Innkeeper.rules: Each night\*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

Pacifist.rules: Executed good players might not die.

Juggler.rules: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.

Shabaloth.rules: Each night\*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

Sage.rules: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.

Recluse.rules: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

Mastermind.rules: If the Demon dies by execution, play for one more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

Snake Charmer.rules: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

Baron.rules: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

Courtier.rules: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

Devil's Advocate.rules: Each night, choose a living player (not the same as last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

Sailor.rules: Each night, choose a player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

Moonchild.rules: When you learn that you died, choose 1 alive player: if good, they die tonight.

Tea Lady.rules: If both your alive neighbours are good, they can't die.

Assassin.rules: Once per game, at night\*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

Dreamer.rules: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): you learn 1 good & 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.

Ravenkeeper.rules: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

Librarian.rules: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play)

Gambler.rules: Each night\*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

Flowergirl.rules: Each night\*, you learn if the Demon voted today.

Spy.rules: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

Fool.rules: The first time you die, you don't.

Washerwoman.rules: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

Tinker.rules: You might die at any time.

Sweetheart.rules: If you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

Fang Gu.rules: Each night\*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider chosen becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]

Exorcist.rules: Each night\*, choose a player (not the same as last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are & doesn't act tonight.

Klutz.rules: When you learn that you died, publicly choose an alive good player, or your team loses.

Mathematician.rules: Each night, you learn how many players' abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another characterâs ability.

Butler.rules: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

Undertaker.rules: Each night\*, you learn which character died by execution today.

Artist.rules: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

Poisoner.rules: Each night, choose a player: their ability malfunctions tonight and tomorrow day.

Barber.rules: If you die, tonight the Demon may choose 2 players to swap characters.

Grandmother.rules: You start knowing a good player & character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.

Pukka.rules: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned until tomorrow night, then die. You act on the 1st night.

Professor.rules: Once per game, at night\*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

Savant.rules: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

Zombuul.rules: Each night\*, if no one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.

Pit-Hag.rules: Each night\*, choose a player & a character they become (if not in play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

Virgin.rules: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

Gossip.rules: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

Seamstress.rules: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

Town Crier.rules: Each night\*, you learn if a Minion nominated that day.

Po.rules: Each night,\* you may choose a player: they die. If you chose no one last night, choose 3 players tonight.

Philosopher.rules: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: become them. If you duplicate an in-play character, they are drunk.

Saint.rules: If you are executed, your team loses.

Oracle.rules: Each night\*, you learn how many dead players are evil.

Fortune Teller.rules: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is 1 good player that registers falsely to you.

Investigator.rules: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

Slayer.rules: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

Lunatic.rules: You think you are a Demon, but your abilities malfunction. The Demon knows who you are & who you attack.

Scarlet Woman.rules: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travelers don't count)

Soldier.rules: You are safe from the Demon.

Vortox.rules: Each night\*, choose a player: they die. Good abilities yield false information. Each day, if no one is executed, evil wins.

Chef.rules: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

Drunk.rules: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk, but your ability malfunctions.

Evil Twin.rules: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.

Godfather.rules: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

Imp.rules: Each night\*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

Vigormortis.rules: Each night\*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbour. [-1 Outsider]

Goon.rules: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

Minstrel.rules: If a Minion died today, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk all night, until dusk.

Mutant.rules: If you are "mad" about being an Outsider, you might be executed.

Mayor.rules: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.
